texts.name: Warela
texts.biography: One of Elrisa's best students, Warela is said to be able to cast the most accurate and powerful Magic Arrows in all of Fairydom.

specialty.description: Casts Magic Arrow with increased effect, based on hero level compared to the level of the target unit (the bonus is greater when used on weaker units).
specialty.tooltip:
{Magic Arrow}

Casts Magic Arrow with increased effect.
specialty.name: Magic Arrow
